resources.string: Welcome to the Phone Bill Application

****************
 Nicholas Muller
 Project 5
 ****************


##############
 ## OVERVIEW ##
 ##############

 This is the README file for the phone bill application!
 This application collects and stores phone calls into an android app with a little help from some text files. If a phone bill does not exist it will create a new phone bill on the app. If the customer already has a phone bill append a new phone call to their already existing one. The purpose is for all phone calls on a given account to be visible in the customers phone bill. The customer also has the option to search phone calls given a date and time range.
